Generation V.Black: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
Generation V.White: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
Generation V.Black 2: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.
Generation V.White 2: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.

Generation VI.X: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
Generation VI.Y: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

Generation VII.Sun: They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow stronger and more powerful each time they faint or are injured.
Generation VII.Moon: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck out their insides.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Known as a natural-born warrior, soon after its hatching, it will challenge its parent to a fight in order to gain their acceptance.

Generation VIII.Sword: If it spies a strong Pokémon, Rufflet can't resist challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses, it starts bawling.
Generation VIII.Shield: A combative Pokémon, it's ready to pick a fight with anyone. It has talons that can crush hard berries.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.

Generation IX.Scarlet: They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow stronger and more powerful each time they faint or are injured.
Generation IX.Violet: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.
